title: Star Guardian Ahri V/O Bug
body:
Is it just me or does Star Guardian Ahris voice sometimes here and there switch back to her old one? its not just me thats having this issue???? please tell me its not just me

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: They already removed the announcer. Now it's the Worlds Baron thing. If you noticed even the minions are no more star guardians.
its not that, im talking about Star Guardian Ahri herself.
